summary: Rebalances requiem in a few minor ways, mostly having to do with late-game issues.
descriptionHtml:
Reduces the damage of some higher-level spells, because wow.  The specifics are available for view on [url=https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1h7Q8nf3iIUWux0O3PXeM_kJbxTRdUNQcrlSKnZ6XsWk/edit#gid=0]this spreadsheet[/url].

I'm particularly proud of the revised Lightning Cascade spell.  It will now randomly strike the target with lightning bolts from the sky throughout the duration, instead of pummeling them every second or so.  The new version is unpredictable and quite a lot of fun!

Makes double-enchanting more effective.  In Requiem, enchanting an item with two effects makes both effects only 55% effective.  The rebalance makes then 75% effective.

Requires [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/?]Requiem[/url], obviously.  Load after Requiem.
author: Arrogancy
